Name: Pretty Hentai Girls
About the game: Introduction Pretty Hentai Girls is a puzzle game, where you need to restore pictures of charming girls - piece by piece. Relaxing gameplay, based on watching dozens of beautiful girls (and solving puzzles, of cause). Every solved puzzle opens new and new adorable pictures in your gallery. And if some puzzles will be too much tangled - ingame assistant always will solve them for you in one click. Features 20 beautiful girls Friendly-will-solve-them-for-u assistant 1-handed gameplay Solve puzzles and chill
